channel.title: Changing text
channel.description: cant seem to find where to change things like "the bank of" or "when you have finished playing" I checked the client.java on both source and client files

item.title: Changing text
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The text is packed into the interfaces, that’s why.

Can use packet 126 server sided to change it, the ids are:

Id: 5383 "The Bank of RuneScape" Id: 2450 "When you have finished playing" Id: 2451 "RuneScape, always use the" Id: 2452 "button below to logout safely." Id: 2458 "Click here to logout"

Another method is to go in the client and where the client reads the interface strings, you replace any instance of the word “runescape”.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
